languages.text: "Ереси, каковы бы они ни были, проникают исподволь. Незаметно для того, кто становится их жертвой. Думаю, мы об{mf|а|е} немало размышляли об этом в последнее время".
"Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."
languages.original_text: "Ереси, каковы бы они ни были, проникают исподволь. Незаметно для того, кто становится их жертвой. Думаю, мы об{mf|а|е} немало размышляли об этом в последнее время".

traits.locale_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."
"Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."
"Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."
"Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."
"Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."
"Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

languages.text: "Egal, welche Gestalt sie annimmt, Ketzerei ist stets ein schleichender Prozess, von dem das letztliche Opfer nichts ahnt. Ich denke, darüber haben wir in den letzten Tagen beide viel nachgedacht."
languages.original_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

traits.locale_text: "Egal, welche Gestalt sie annimmt, Ketzerei ist stets ein schleichender Prozess, von dem das letztliche Opfer nichts ahnt. Ich denke, darüber haben wir in den letzten Tagen beide viel nachgedacht."

languages.text: « Quelle que soit la forme qu'elle prenne, l'hérésie est toujours insidieuse, perpétrée à l'insu de son ultime victime. Je pense que nous y avons {mf|tous|toutes} les deux suffisamment réfléchi ces derniers jours. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle que soit la forme qu'elle prenne, l'hérésie est toujours insidieuse, perpétrée à l'insu de son ultime victime. Je pense que nous y avons {mf|tous|toutes} les deux suffisamment réfléchi ces derniers jours. »

languages.text: “无论异端恶行以何种形式出现，往往都悄无声息，令受害者猝不及防。我相信，最近这段时间里，你我两人都充分思考过这个问题。”
languages.original_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

traits.locale_text: “无论异端恶行以何种形式出现，往往都悄无声息，令受害者猝不及防。我相信，最近这段时间里，你我两人都充分思考过这个问题。”

languages.text: «Independientemente de la forma que adopte, la herejía siempre es algo callado que sorprende a su víctima. Creo que usted y yo hemos pensado bastante en esto últimamente».
languages.original_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

traits.locale_text: «Independientemente de la forma que adopte, la herejía siempre es algo callado que sorprende a su víctima. Creo que usted y yo hemos pensado bastante en esto últimamente».

languages.text: 「どのような形であれ、異端は常に、その最終的な犠牲者に気づかれることなく、静かに歩み続ける。ここ数日、我々二人とも、このことを少しは考えたと思う」
languages.original_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

traits.locale_text: 「どのような形であれ、異端は常に、その最終的な犠牲者に気づかれることなく、静かに歩み続ける。ここ数日、我々二人とも、このことを少しは考えたと思う」

languages.text: "Şekli fark etmeksizin kâfirlik, nihai kurbanın ruhu bile duymadan daima sinsice hareket eder. Son günlerde ikimiz de bunun üzerine epey kafa yormuşuzdur."
languages.original_text: "Whatever form it may take, heresy always treads quietly, unbeknownst to its ultimate victim. I believe both of us have given some thought to this in recent days."

traits.locale_text: "Ne şekilde olursa olsun, sapkınlık nihai kurbanın ruhu bile duymadan daima sinsice hareket eder. Son günlerde ikimiz de bunun üzerine epey kafa yormuşuzdur."
